statements: DELETE FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team = 'TeamA' AND away_team = 'TeamB';
DELETE FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date < '2022-08-01' AND home_team = 'Barcelona'
DELETE FROM game_schedule WHERE game_time BETWEEN '18:00:00' AND '20:00:00'
DELETE FROM players WHERE team_id = 3 AND score < 50;
DELETE FROM games WHERE game_date < '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Stadium%';
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played < 10);
DELETE FROM team_stats WHERE total_games_played > 50 AND total_wins < 20;
DELETE FROM teams WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
